prompts: Create a gooey, purple Pokemon that has a sludgy appearance and large teeth.
Imagine a creature with bright pink and yellow colors that oozes and moves slowly.
Show me a Pokemon with an amorphous body shape that looks like it's made of sludge.
Generate a unique Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and has a toxic nature.
Design a creature that can blend into its surroundings with its vibrant colors and slimy texture.
Give me an idea for a Pokemon that has a playful yet mischievous personality.
Make a character that embodies pollution with a colorful and messy appearance.
